sentences.en: Ancient Chinese philosophers were born out of sorcery.
sentences.cn: 中国古代哲学家们起初多信奉巫术。

sentences.en: Alleged sorcery by fox demons occasionally caused collective panics.
sentences.cn: 宣扬狐妖巫术偶尔会引发群体的恐慌。

sentences.en: There is no sorcery against Jacob, no divination against Israel.
sentences.cn: 断没有法术可以害雅各，也没有占卜可以害以色列。
